title: The Professional
content: Friday. June 18, 2004. 4:37pm--I just became a paid (and therefore, professional) type designer!
author: A. Scott Britton

comments.content: Well don't keep us in suspense, Mr. Britton. What's the face, who's the client, how many zeroes on the check?

It's a very small job, with an extremely small payout. Just a small clothing company in Columbus, Ohio who wants me to design their humble logo as a TrueType font.   
   
I'm excited just the same!

Sounds dandy. Just ramp things up over time!   
   
hhp

One small font for steps, one large leap for fontkind (and for Scott)   
   
:-)   
   
ChrisL
